plot: A young orchestra conductor returns to the island where she was born after loosing her family in strange circumstances. As in Mozart's The Magic Flute, she must cross three doors to forgive herself and start over again.
title: Solsticio
plot_es: A young orchestra conductor returns to the island where she was born after loosing her family in strange circumstances. As in Mozart's The Magic Flute, she must cross three doors to forgive herself and start over again.
plot_en: A young orchestra conductor returns to the island where she was born after loosing her family in strange circumstances. As in Mozart's The Magic Flute, she must cross three doors to forgive herself and start over again.
